Gyros Protein Technologies 推出用于自动平行肽纯化的 PurePep EasyClean Auto Kit Gyros Protein Technologies AB 是肽合成仪和试剂的领先供应商，也是自动化纳升级免疫分析领域的先驱，今天宣布推出 PurePep® EasyClean (PEC) 自动试剂盒，用于肽的自动并行纯化，加速下游工艺简单到复杂的肽药物和疗法的研究、开发和生产。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-introduces-PurePep-EasyClean-Auto-Kit-for-automated-parallel-peptide-purification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-introduces-PurePep-EasyClean-Auto-Kit-for-automated-parallel-peptide-purification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=910e258e-2f6b-4750-b9a4-ddf7ee0c7289 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 05:34:00 -0400 Gyros Protein Technologies introduces PurePep EasyClean Auto Kit for automated parallel peptide purification
